I don't see why we couldn't discuss Ouija in here. It is a form of ITC.

  =
----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Kristin Morris 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogr=
oups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 10, 2009 8:03 AM
  Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] A=
n alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.






  If it is the same Ou=
ija Board I'm thinking of.. I joined that group for a day I think.  It was =
just one guy sending out new age messages about each day's moon scope or so=
mething??  I quit in less than a day.  
  k



----------------------------=
--------------------------------------------------
  From: EVP-ITC@yahoogro=
ups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of April Abercrombie
  S=
ent: Friday, April 10, 2009 8:17 AM
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Subject=
: Re: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunter stuff.



  What d=
o you mean? There is a Ouija Boards group, or did you want to start one?

 =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Frank Sumption 
    To: grasshar=
p@yahoogroups.com ; evp-itc@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, April 09, =
2009 7:39 PM
    Subject: [EVP-ITC] An alternative to the usual ghost hunte=
r stuff.



    ouijaboards group on yahoo. I was hoping to get some discus=
sion going of the actual messages, not the ghost hunting aspects.  

     F=
rank-S
